name: AP_CLAIM_IF_GOB3_NARRAY
description: This table extracts data received from prospective payment systems (PPS) pricer for a claim in GOB3.DRG 'Diagnosis Grouper Flag'.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: DX_DX_GRPR_FLAG
columns.description: Flag that shows how a diagnosis code was utilized by the grouper. For inpatient diagnosis related group grouping only. Data received in GOB3.DRG block on incoming message.
